title: RHOBH Reunion Part II: Erika, Tom and the Finances | RHOBH Reunion Episode 2
description:
In our second special episode of Chic Shit Only, Lauren is joined by Bravo besties Brice Sander (of Entertainment Tonight) and Maggie Kelley (of the Best of Bravo instagram) to discuss part II of the Real Housewives of Beverly Hills reunion. They dive into the way Andy Cohen dove into questioning Erika Jayne Girardi, talk Lisa Rinna, Harry Styles -- and end things with a nice dusting of chatter on the premiere of Winter House!
Watch the podcast on YouTube: https://bit.ly/ChicShitOnlyYT
Watch the podcast on IG: https://bit.ly/ChicShitOnlyIG
Don’t forget to subscribe to the podcast for free wherever you're listening or by using this link: https://bit.ly/ChicShitOnlyPodcast
